name: Subsanity
description:
*If you have any performance issues, I recommend running the downloadable JAR version of the game at the bottom of the page. Thanks!

Dive deeper and deeper into the deep blue sea. Will you reach the ocean floor? Or will you succumb to subsanity...?

WASD to move. You may have to click the game window first.

Created for the 48th Ludum Dare!

Made using libGDX.

Credits:
